bukkit.Vandolis
Class User

java.lang.Object
  bukkit.Vandolis.EconEntity
      bukkit.Vandolis.User

public class User
extends EconEntity

Main player class for the economy. Eventually holds the player that is being interacted with.

Author:
Vandolis

User

public User(java.lang.String saveString)
Creates a User object based off of a save string from a file. Save string contains the users name, amount of money, as well as the last time they got an auto-deposit.

Parameters:
saveString -

Used for loading from the file
